mdRecord.dcterms:title: Huff Cemetery III
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Location: south on Rt. 8 4.1 miles, right on Fairview Church Rd. Go 2.5 miles to Cox Store Road. Fairview Church of the Brethren on right. Access: go right of church on blacktop to back of church. N 36 50.466' W080 20.828'
